title: Regenerate heart-based favicon assets and align index.html references

requirements.summary: Generate and add/overwrite the full favicon PNG set from Heart.png at the exact sizes/filenames referenced by frontend/index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: All generated icons visually match the uploaded `Heart.png` (centered heart within the circular badge) when viewed at their respective sizes.

file_operations.description: Generate from `Heart.png` and add/overwrite as a 16x16 PNG heart favicon under the generated assets directory.
Generate from `Heart.png` and add/overwrite as a 32x32 PNG heart favicon under the generated assets directory.
Generate from `Heart.png` and add/overwrite as a 180x180 PNG apple touch icon under the generated assets directory.
Generate from `Heart.png` and add/overwrite as a 192x192 PNG android chrome icon under the generated assets directory.
Generate from `Heart.png` and add/overwrite as a 512x512 PNG android chrome icon under the generated assets directory.

requirements.summary: Ensure frontend/index.html favicon link tags exactly match the generated /assets/generated filenames and sizes so references resolve at runtime.
acceptanceCriteria: The following references in `frontend/index.html` resolve to existing files in `frontend/public/assets/generated/`: `/assets/generated/favicon-16.dim_16x16.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png`, `/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png`.

file_operations.description: Verify favicon <link> tags (href paths, filenames, and sizes attributes) align exactly with the generated files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`; update only if any mismatch exists.

requirements.summary: Replace the root /favicon.ico with an .ico generated from Heart.png so browsers requesting /favicon.ico display the correct heart icon.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/favicon.ico` is updated and contains the heart-based favicon (not the previous placeholder).
Loading `/favicon.ico` in the browser displays the heart icon.

file_operations.description: Regenerate and replace the existing ICO using `Heart.png` as the source (include common ICO sizes so it renders well across browsers) and overwrite the file at this path.
